mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.brand_name, p.price, p.stock, p.status, (SELECT img_url FROM PRODUCT_IMG i WHERE i.product_id = p.product_id LIMIT 1) AS img_url FROM PRODUCT p WHERE p.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') ORDER BY p.product_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT WHERE product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.brand_name, p.price, (SELECT img_url FROM PRODUCT_IMG i WHERE i.product_id = p.product_id LIMIT 1) AS img_url FROM PRODUCT p WHERE p.status = '판매중' ORDER BY p.product_id DESC LIMIT 6

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.brand_name, p.price, (SELECT img_url FROM PRODUCT_IMG i WHERE i.product_id = p.product_id LIMIT 1) AS img_url, COUNT(pc.product_id) AS click_count FROM PRODUCT p LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_CLICK pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id WHERE p.status = '판매중' GROUP BY p.product_id ORDER BY click_count DESC LIMIT 6;
SELECT img_url FROM product_img WHERE product_id = #{product_id}

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, (SELECT img_url FROM PRODUCT_IMG i WHERE i.product_id = p.product_id LIMIT 1) AS img_url, COUNT(pc.product_id) AS click_count FROM PRODUCT p LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_CLICK pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id WHERE p.category = (SELECT category FROM PRODUCT WHERE product_id = #{product_id}) AND p.product_id != #{current_product_id} GROUP BY p.product_id ORDER BY click_count DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, (SELECT img_url FROM PRODUCT_IMG i WHERE i.product_id = p.product_id LIMIT 1) AS img_url, COUNT(pc.product_id) AS click_count FROM PRODUCT p LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_CLICK pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id WHERE p.status = '판매중' GROUP BY p.product_id ORDER BY click_count DESC LIMIT 3;
